explanation: This application is borderline because monthly debt obligations are high relative to income and missed payments in the last year raise concerns.

interview_questions.question: Your debt-to-income ratio is high. Are any debts close to being paid off?
interview_questions.follow_up: Can you provide payoff letters or consolidation plan?

interview_questions.question: You missed some payments recently. Were these due to temporary circumstances?
interview_questions.follow_up: Can you demonstrate improved payment behavior?

interview_questions.question: We noticed some inconsistencies in your submitted documents. Can you clarify these?
interview_questions.follow_up: Can you provide original or certified copies?

interview_questions.question: Can you provide more details about how you'll use this loan?
interview_questions.follow_up: Do you have documentation supporting this purpose?

interview_questions.question: You have some late payments in the last 12 months. What caused these delays?
interview_questions.follow_up: Have your circumstances improved since then?

pd_improvement_estimate.note: Estimate assumes all recommended actions are completed. Actual improvement may vary.
